column1: '''Robin Atkin Downes''' is a British actor.
He auditioned for the role of [[Aragorn
column2: Aragorn]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column3: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. Atkin Downes was stated as trying out for the role but was not what the casting crew was looking for. He did  voice several characters in [[:Category:Games
column4: video games]], but none of them were Aragorn.

column1: * [[2006]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'' - Additional voices
* 2006 - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' - Additional voices
* [[2003]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'' - Elven Lightbearer, Additional voices
* [http://voicechasers.com/database/showactor.php?actorid=4210 Robin Atkin Downes] at [http://voicechasers.com/ Voice Chasers]
